titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 21350 Avalon Boulevard in Carson, California, as the "Juanita Millender-McDonald Post Office".
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 21350 Avalon Boulevard in Carson, California, as the "Juanita Millender-McDonald Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 21350 Avalon Boulevard in Carson, California, as the "Juanita Millender-McDonald Post Office."
